name: Bitmaze (tryptefan)
description:
The year is 2030. The world is dominated by a single corporate entity. The one thing standing between the total subjugation of humanity and freedom is a lone hacker. Armed only with a home computer and some backdoor encryption keys, you must navigate the mainframe firewalls in order to take down the system.

CONTROLS ⌨

← →  ↓Arrows keys to move blocks
Z X To rotate blocks
SPACE To use encryption floppy disk

Bugs are lore~
